description: Momone is a teacher, and the entire male body lusts after her. She has the body of a goddess. Hino, one of the bad boys of the university, is also attracted to her, and one day, he dares to visit her apartment. Hino succeeds in seducing her and makes her beg for sex. Unable to control her sexual desires, Momone even agrees to become his lover. Later in class he places some stimulant on her pussy. Will she be able to control herself or will she submit in front of the entire class?
title: Momone
